code: import{useState}from"react";import'../ComponentStyles/login.css';import{Button}from"react-bootstrap";import LoginUser from"../../Controllers/Users/LoginUser";import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){let{SetError,setCurrentUser}=_ref;const[loginUsername,setLoginUsername]=useState("");const[loginPassword,setLoginPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();async function Login(){const user=await LoginUser(loginUsername,loginPassword,SetError);setCurrentUser(user);if(user)navigate('/');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-title-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Log in to Your Account"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-inputs-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"input-group-text login-icon",type:"email",id:"basic-addon1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-envelope-at-fill"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:loginUsername,onChange:e=>setLoginUsername(e.target.value),className:"form-control login-input login-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"input-group-text login-icon",id:"basic-addon1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-shield-fill-check"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Password",value:loginPassword,type:"password",onChange:e=>setLoginPassword(e.target.value),className:"form-control login-input login-input"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-btn-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"btn btn-success",onClick:()=>Login(),className:"login-btn",children:"Log In"})})]})]});}export default Login;
